title: Game keeps freezing!
body: I have never had this, but as of recent, my game has started freezing randomly, the freezes look like I don't have enough Ram, but I have 8Gb which is more than enough, my PC has never had problems with league, I have an AMD Athlon II X4 860K, and for the GPU NVIDIA GTX750Ti. Please help me, because this is so obnoxious and I have never had anything like this, oh and yeah league is the only game that does this for me! Thanks for all the answers!

replies.body: Have you recently updated Windows 10?  The [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) has been known to cause freezing, so disabling it could help.  Otherwise, try out the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help troubleshoot these frame drops and to make sure your drivers are up to date.  Test it in a custom, and let me know if it helps.
